transArray.content: As a regular hotel in Beijing, the location and room comfort are self-evident, very good. This time, because of the epidemic, the health treasure in Beijing was suspended. Fortunately, Shimao Gongsan nearby had a 5-hour fast nucleic acid, and the hotel staff helped me report to the community as soon as possible. Thank you very much for the timely service of the clerk, so that I did not delay other trips
